briefTitle: Immunogenicity, Safety of GSKs Tdap Vaccine Boostrix When Coadministered With GSKs Influenza Vaccine Fluarix in Adults
officialTitle: A Study to Evaluate Immunogenicity and Safety of Boostrix When Co-administered With Fluarix in Subjects 19 Years of Age and Older
summary: The current study will provide information for the use of Boostrix concomitantly with influenza vaccine in adults aged 19-64 years. This study will also provide safety and immunogenicity data in a cohort of adults aged greater than or equal to 65 years.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Seroprotected Subjects Against Diphteria (D) and Tetanus (T) Toxoid Antigens
